statements: SELECT * FROM ClimateData ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT id, temperature FROM ClimateData WHERE humidity > 60;
SELECT MAX(temperature) FROM ClimateData;
SELECT AVG(rainfall) AS avg_rainfall FROM ClimateData;
SELECT id, temperature, humidity, rainfall FROM ClimateData WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, temperature FROM ClimateData WHERE temperature > 25.0 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, humidity FROM ClimateData WHERE humidity < 60.0 ORDER BY humidity ASC;
SELECT id, rainfall FROM ClimateData WHERE rainfall BETWEEN 100.0 AND 200.0 ORDER BY id ASC, rainfall DESC;
SELECT id, temperature, humidity, rainfall FROM ClimateData WHERE temperature < 20.0 OR humidity > 70.0 AND rainfall < 50.0 ORDER BY humidity DESC, id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ClimateData ORDER BY temperature ASC, humidity DESC, id ASC;
SELECT * FROM AgroforestryClimateData;
SELECT location, temperature FROM AgroforestryClimateData WHERE humidity > 80;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS average_temp FROM AgroforestryClimateData GROUP BY location;
SELECT * FROM AgroforestryPractices WHERE practice_name LIKE 'Agro%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT location, humidity FROM AgroforestryClimateData WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT * FROM AgroforestryClimateData WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60
SELECT location, temperature FROM AgroforestryClimateData ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT AVG(temperature) as avg_temperature, AVG(humidity) as avg_humidity FROM AgroforestryClimateData
SELECT location, COUNT(*) as observation_count FROM AgroforestryClimateData GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 10
SELECT p.practice_name, p.description, c.temperature, c.humidity FROM AgroforestryPractices p JOIN AgroforestryClimateData c ON p.implemented_by = c.location
SELECT * FROM climate_data;
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM climate_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT id, crop_name FROM agroforestry_practices WHERE soil_type = 'clay';
SELECT * FROM analysis_results WHERE analysis_type = 'Chemical';
SELECT id, analysis_date, conclusions FROM analysis_results ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM climate_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY location ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, humidity, rainfall FROM climate_data WHERE location = 'New York' AND rainfall > 50 ORDER BY humidity DESC;
SELECT * FROM agroforestry_practices WHERE planting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY harvest_date ASC;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, soil_type FROM agroforestry_practices WHERE soil_type = 'Loamy' ORDER BY planting_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT analysis_date, analysis_type, result FROM analysis_results WHERE analysis_type LIKE '%DNA%' AND result IN ('Positive', 'Negative') ORDER BY analysis_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM climate_data ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT id, temperature, rainfall FROM climate_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT city, country, latitude, longitude FROM location WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT practice_name, description FROM agroforestry_practices WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(description) > 100;
SELECT date, conclusion FROM analysis_results ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM climate_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT city, country FROM location WHERE latitude < 0 AND longitude > 0;
SELECT agroforestry_practices.practice_name, analysis_results.conclusion FROM agroforestry_practices INNER JOIN analysis_results ON agroforestry_practices.practice_id = analysis_results.practice_id;
SELECT AVG(rainfall), MAX(temperature) FROM climate_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT location.city, location.country, COUNT(analysis_results.result_id) AS total_results FROM location LEFT JOIN analysis_results ON location.location_id = analysis_results.location_id GROUP BY location.city, location.country HAVING total_results > 5;
SELECT * FROM Climate_Data;
SELECT farmer_name, location FROM Farmers;
SELECT crop_name, yield_quantity, harvest_date FROM Harvest_Data WHERE yield_quantity > 1000;
SELECT practice_name, tree_species FROM Agroforestry_Practices ORDER BY practice_name ASC;
SELECT soil_type, acidity_level FROM Soil_Data WHERE acidity_level < 6.5 ORDER BY acidity_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM Climate_Data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 70;
SELECT farmer_name, location, contact_number FROM Farmers WHERE location LIKE '%valley%';
SELECT crop_name, yield_quantity, harvest_date FROM Harvest_Data ORDER BY harvest_date DESC;
SELECT tree_species, planting_date FROM Agroforestry_Practices WHERE DATE(planting_date) = CURDATE();
SELECT soil_type, acidity_level, fertility FROM Soil_Data WHERE acidity_level BETWEEN 4.0 AND 6.0;
